name: token
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool oauthecho.
Tool description: Illustrates "Client Credentials" OAuth 2.0 Grant Type. This grant type is used by clients to obtain an access token outside of the context of a user
API description: Generates an OAuth token from the RapidAPI 'OAuth Echo' endpoint.

client_secret.description: The client's secret key. Defaults to None.

client_id.description: The client's ID. Defaults to None.
